name: Amalgagunner
description:
A 2D gunner with a twist - use your enemies' remains as tools to quench your thirst for power!

Run around as CatBot, and blast away waves of enemies, picking up their parts as you go along in this adventure. And when you earn enough, cash them in at the shop for some sweet rewards for your feline friend.

If you're curious, the controls are:

  • WASD/Arrow keys to move and jump
  • Mouse to aim, LMB to shoot and click things

It was pretty fun making this game - though very stressful towards the end, of course. I found it a fun concept to play around with, and I have a lot of ideas to add to the game if I ever come back (that I would've added already if time wasn't so finite). The artwork I'm especially pleased with, and the limited palette ended up working alright for this game. I hope you had as much fun playing it as I did making it - hopefully with less stress!

Oh, and the music links are here: 

Menu music: https://opengameart.org/content/theme-song-8-bit

Game music: https://opengameart.org/content/pulsar-famitracker-2a03

Ending music: https://opengameart.org/content/chiptune-medieval-minstrel-dance

P.S sorry about the development build, but other WebGL builds just... wouldn't work. Weird. For the proper experience, try the standalone build below - but be warned that Linux and Mac aren't tested!
